ImageSubtraction Class Reference

For subtracting images using the Alard kernel fit technique. A basic assumption: Ref and New are already geometrically aligned. More...

 ClassDef (ImageSubtraction, 1)

Detailed Description

For subtracting images using the Alard kernel fit technique. A basic assumption: Ref and New are already geometrically aligned.
